titleStmt.title: An answer to a letter from a clergyman in the city, to his friend in the country containing his reasons for not reading the declaration.
titleStmt.author: Poulton.
Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695. Letter from a clergyman in the city to his friend in the country.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Poulton. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Includes text of "A letter from a clergyman."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
